TopicTitle: Finally getting windows next week... Steam games needed.

Articles.Content:
So I am finally getting widnows next week. (Mac user.) I need some steam games...

I like sandbox games and space RPG's. Or just unconventional indie games.

My current list:

Space Engineers

Robocraft

Rigs of rods
TF2's a good choice, as is Space Engineers. I also recommend Just Cause 2 and it's accompanying MP mod/DLC.
